EmailTemplate.name: 06_02_2015 GreenCircle Check In.GC login Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {{Lead.First Name}} Did You Know You're A Green Circle Member?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://plus.google.com/events/cpbr6tamqmf9f40f21q3pchl5sk> Hey {{Lead.First Name}},
Did you know that you are a member of our Green Circle Community <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/welcome>? This forum allows our customers to ask questions, learn about best practices, and interact directly with one another as well as VMTurbo software developers, engineers, and founders. On the horizon you will have full access to free training videos, a personal live-chat capability with our team, and many more capabilities!
You can also accumulate points by participating and giving us ideas. You can then redeem these points for cool VMTurbo swag! Come engage with your peers on how to maximize your VMTurbo investment!
Log in today <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/login.jspa> to receive 100 points just for getting started – also – every 25th login will receive a Free Quadcopter! Don’t remember what your login is? Reset your password here <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/emailPasswordToken!input.jspa>! We want to hear from you! Your VMTurbo Customer Experience Team
